name: First Year Experience Simulator
description:
As a first year student at CUNY Queens College, there's some things you don't know- like where to register for classes, who to turn to for tutoring, and how to decide your major. Play this simulator game to get some answers and learn about all available resources at QC!

Developed by Lily D and Hasnatul H
under supervision of Jorge Velez and Megan Paslawksi
